GameModel

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    Notifications are used to send Note objects to specific Players. They can be sent to any number of Players
    Author:
    Matthew Latura

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN)
      The default constructor for Notification takes a Player Iterator parameter and sets it to the toBeNotified field.
      Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN, java.lang.String note)
      A more powerful constructor takes a Player Iterator containing the Players to send the note to as well as a String to set as the Note's message
      Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN, java.lang.String note, boolean isChat)
      A more powerful constructor takes a Player Iterator containing the Players to send the note to as well as a String to set as the Note's message and a boolean as to whether the note is a chat message or not.
      Notification(Player player, boolean b)
      A minimal constructor that takes a single Player parameter to send the Note to and a boolean that determines whether or not the Note is a chat message.
      Notification(Player playerToRecieve, java.lang.String message, boolean isChat)
      This constructor takes a single Player as a parameter rather than an iterator holding multiple Players.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Note getNote()
      Returns the Note object contained by this Notification
      java.util.Iterator<Player> getPlayersToNotify()
      Returns the iterator of Players that will be sent the Note
      java.lang.String getString()
      Returns the message of the Note contained in this Notification
      boolean isChatMessage()
      Returns whether or not this Notification's Note is a chat message
      void setNote(Note note)
      Sets the Note object contained by this Notification
      void setString(java.lang.String message)
      Sets the message held by the Note object in this Notification

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN)
        The default constructor for Notification takes a Player Iterator parameter and sets it to the toBeNotified field. The Notification's note is has a default message and is not a chat message
        Parameters:
        tBN - - The Player Iterator contaning the Players to send the note

      • Notification

        public Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN,
            java.lang.String note)
        A more powerful constructor takes a Player Iterator containing the Players to send the note to as well as a String to set as the Note's message
        Parameters:
        tBN - - The Player Iterator containing the Players to send the Note to
        note - - The string to set as the Note's message

      • Notification

        public Notification(java.util.Iterator<Player> tBN,
            java.lang.String note,
            boolean isChat)
        A more powerful constructor takes a Player Iterator containing the Players to send the note to as well as a String to set as the Note's message and a boolean as to whether the note is a chat message or not.
        Parameters:
        tBN - - The Player Iterator containing the Players to send the Note to
        note - - The string to set as the Note's message
        isChat - - Whether or not the note is a chat message

      • Notification

        public Notification(Player playerToRecieve,
            java.lang.String message,
            boolean isChat)
        This constructor takes a single Player as a parameter rather than an iterator holding multiple Players. It also allows you to set the message and whether or not it is a chat message
        Parameters:
        playerToRecieve - - The Player to receive the Note
        message - - The string to set as the Note's message
        isChat - - Whether or not the note is a chat message

      • Notification

        public Notification(Player player,
            boolean b)
        A minimal constructor that takes a single Player parameter to send the Note to and a boolean that determines whether or not the Note is a chat message. The Note's message is set to an empty String.
        Parameters:
        player - - Player to send the note to
        b - - Whether the note is a chat message
